Headline: Green Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running with delays due to earlier police activity near Harlem/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running with delays due to earlier police activity near Harlem/Lake.

Bus shuttles are available from Harlem/Lake to Laramie/Lake.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute near Broadway/Cornelia
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses temp. rerouted both directions due to street blockage near  Broadway/Cornelia.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses temp. rerouted both directions due to street blockage near  Broadway/Cornelia.

Southbound buses will operate via Addison, Lake Shore, Belmont, and resume normal route..

Northbound buses will operate via Broadway, Belmont, Lake Shore, Addison, Broadway, and resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.
